#include <iostream>
#include <memory.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#define FOR(i , n) for (int (i) = 0; (i) < (n); (i)++ )
#define MAX 10022
using namespace std;

int a[MAX];

bool isit(int u, int v){
	if ( a[u] && a[v] )
		return false;
	else {
		a[u] = a[v] = true;
	}
	return true;
}

int main(){ //freopen ("in.txt","r",stdin);
	int n,m; cin >> n >> m;
	memset (a , 0 , sizeof(a));
	FOR (such , m){
		int x , y; cin >> x >> y;
		if (! isit( x , y) ){
			puts("NO");
			return 0;
		}
	}
	puts("YES");
	return 0;
}
